text: RT @troyesivan: send me vids saying “Troye is coming to Hong Kong!” pls so we can make something cool and I can see u guys #TroyeInHK

@troyesivan The world makes way for you.
The whole world blossoms because of you.
Everyone loves you,come on!
We are waiting for you in China. https://t.co/H1nl5YXZBJ
Don't want to lose is the most distant star.
@troyesivan I'm waiting for you in China。
这样的行为不代表什么，无论是温柔的话还是温暖的双手，到了明天，一定又会恢复原状，所以，这份感情，也只好漫无目的的消失了。
I was used to loneliness a year ago,but now it needs to be restarted.
